name: International Experts Summit on Biomedical Engineering and Systems
content: It is a great pleasure to welcome the International Experts Summit on Biomedical Engineering and Systems (BioMed Summit-2025) in Singapore from March 11-13, 2025\. The BioMed Summit-2025 is a vital platform for exchanging recent achievements and discussing future facilities in Biomedical Engineering. It will be a 3-day event that means gathering the key players of the Biomedical Engineering Community and related sectors. This event is launched to become an established event and attract global participants, intent on sharing, exchanging, and exploring new avenues of Biomedical Engineering scientific and commercial developments. A wide-ranging scientific program consisting of plenary lectures, keynote lectures, invited lectures, parallel sessions, as well as poster sessions for young scientists covering all topics in Biomedical Engineering will be scheduled. This conference provides a wonderful opportunity for you to enhance your knowledge about the newest interdisciplinary approaches in Biomedical Engineering. Moreover, the conference offers a valuable platform to create new contacts in the field, by providing valuable networking time for you to meet great personnel in the field.
